statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'master';
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'MasterKey';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%Key%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'MasterKey';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages WHERE encryption_key_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT key_id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages WHERE encryption_key_id = 3;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages JOIN encryption_keys ON encrypted_messages.encryption_key_id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, recipient_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE encrypted = True;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT message_text, sender_id FROM messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value IS NOT NULL AND created_at > '2023-01-01';
SELECT sender_id, recipient_id FROM messages WHERE encrypted = TRUE AND sender_id != recipient_id ORDER BY sender_id, recipient_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM communications WHERE TIMESTAMP > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC;

SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT comm_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM communications WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT message, sender_id, receiver_id FROM communications WHERE comm_id = 10;
SELECT device_name, last_used FROM devices WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY last_used DESC;
SELECT log_description, log_timestamp FROM logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username;
SELECT device_name, last_used FROM devices WHERE user_id = 3 AND last_used > '2022-01-01';
SELECT comm_id, message, timestamp FROM communications WHERE sender_id = 2 OR receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT key_id, description FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (1, 3, 5);
